content.description: Livia fabulam de magno animo huius canis audivit.
content.question: How is the sentence translated?

choices.label: She heard Livia’s story about a great dog and his courage.
Livia heard a story about the great courage of this dog.
Livia’s story told about the great courage of this dog.
Livia told a great story about this courageous dog.

content.answer: Livia heard a story about the great courage of this dog.
